alert.note: Alert for Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:35PM CST until January 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Blowing and drifting snow.Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Marshall, Roberts and Day Counties. In Minnesota, Traverse County. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
